languages.text: "Неведомо было нам, кто враг, лишь мерзкая тень на переборки ложилась, а гадания молчали, без ответа нас оставив. Но знамения переменились, когда скверна атаковала флагман твой — Неумирающий повелел обнажить клинки, и средь смертей нечестивцев зазвучали ответы. Немедля я направил ткачей в те из нижних отсеков, чье падение в руки врага допустить нельзя. Другие же стали проводниками для свиты твоей".

traits.locale_text: "Неведомо было нам, кто враг, лишь мерзкая тень на переборки ложилась,а гадания молчали, без ответа нас оставив. Но знамения переменились, когда скверна атаковала флагман твой — Неумирающий повелел обнажить клинки, и средь смертей нечестивцев зазвучали ответы. Немедля я направил ткачей в те из нижних отсеков, чье падение в руки врага допустить нельзя. Другие же стали проводниками для свиты твоей".

languages.text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."
languages.original_text: "Неведомо было нам, кто враг, лишь мерзкая тень на переборки ложилась, а гадания молчали, без ответа нас оставив. traits.locale_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bullheads, and the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship. The Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. I sent at once His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."

languages.text: « Nous n'avions aucun moyen de savoir à qui nous avions affaire. Récemment encore, les indices se résumaient à cette ombre terrifiante sur les cloisons ; les présages restaient silencieux et les réponses nous échappaient. Mais les signes ont évolué quand la corruption a envahi votre vaisseau amiral : l'Immortel nous a ordonné de dégainer nos lames et les réponses se sont fait jour à mesure que mouraient les infidèles. J'ai aussitôt envoyé Ses tisseurs auprès des occupants des baies inférieures qui ne devaient surtout pas tomber aux mains de l'ennemi, tandis que d'autres ont fait office de guides pour vos élus. »
languages.original_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'avions aucun moyen de savoir à qui nous avions affaire. Récemment encore, les indices se résumaient à cette ombre terrifiante sur les cloisons ; les présages restaient silencieux et les réponses nous échappaient. Mais les signes ont évolué quand la corruption a envahi votre vaisseau amiral : l'Immortel nous a ordonné de dégainer nos lames et les réponses se sont fait jour à mesure que mouraient les infidèles. J'ai aussitôt envoyé Ses tisseurs auprès des occupants des baies inférieures qui ne devaient surtout pas tomber aux mains de l'ennemi, tandis que d'autres ont fait office de guides pour vos élus. »

languages.text: «No sabíamos quién era el enemigo. Solo sabíamos que había sombras esparciéndose; las adivinaciones no advertían nada, no se leía una respuesta. Pero las señales cambiaron con el asalto de la corrupción a su nave insignia: el Inmortal nos ordenó desenvainar las espadas y, entre las muertes de los malignos, resonaron las respuestas. Envié a los Tejedores al instante contra aquellos de las cubiertas inferiores que no debían caer en manos del enemigo. Otros se convirtieron en guías para su séquito de elegidos».
languages.original_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."

traits.locale_text: «No sabíamos quién era el enemigo. Solo sabíamos que había sombras esparciéndose; las adivinaciones no advertían nada, no se leía una respuesta. Pero las señales cambiaron con el asalto de la corrupción a su nave insignia: el Inmortal nos ordenó desenvainar las espadas y, entre las muertes de los malignos, resonaron las respuestas. Envié a los Tejedores al instante contra aquellos de las cubiertas inferiores que no debían caer en manos del enemigo. Otros se convirtieron en guías para su séquito de elegidos».

languages.text: 「私たちの敵が誰なのか分からなかった。船体の上に恐ろしい影が浮き出てくるだけで、占いは沈黙し、答えが読めなくなってしまった。しかし、腐敗があなた方の旗艦を襲ったとき、兆候は変わりました。不死の者が我々に刃を剥き出しにするよう命じ、邪悪な者たちの死の中で、答えが響き渡った。私はすぐに、敵の手に落ちてはならない下層ベイの者たちに、主の織り手を送った。他の者たちは、選ばれた少数の者たちの案内役となりました」
languages.original_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."

「私たちの敵が誰なのか分からなかった。船体の上に恐ろしい影が浮き出てくるだけで、占いは沈黙し、答えが読めなくなってしまった。しかし、腐敗があなた方の旗艦を襲ったとき、兆候は変わりました。不死の者が我々に刃を剥き出しにするよう命じ、邪悪な者たちの死の中で、答えが響き渡った。私はすぐに、敵の手に落ちてはならない下層ベイの者たちに、主の織り手を送った。他の者たちは、選ばれた少数の者たちの案内役となりました」

languages.text: “那个时候，我们只能看到骇人的阴影，并不清楚我们的敌人究竟是谁。占卜结果如同石沉大海，没有揭示任何答案。然而，当腐化的力量袭击您的旗舰时，占卜的迹象发生了变化。不死之神传达了祂的旨意，要求我们亮出利刃，为邪恶之人带来死亡。于是，我立刻派遣织网者前往底层甲板，以免那片区域落入敌人手中，其余成员则成为了您少数随行人员的向导。”
languages.original_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."

“那个时候，我们只能看到骇人的阴影，并不清楚我们的敌人究竟是谁。占卜结果如同石沉大海，没有揭示任何答案。然而，当腐化的力量袭击您的旗舰时，占卜的迹象发生了变化。不死之神传达了祂的旨意，要求我们亮出利刃，为邪恶之人带来死亡。于是，我立刻派遣织网者前往底层甲板，以免那片区域落入敌人手中，其余成员则成为了您少数随行人员的向导。”

languages.text: "Weil wir nicht wussten, wer unser Feind ist. Da war nur dieser entsetzliche Schatten auf den Schotten ... die Prophetien schwiegen und wir erhielten keine Antworten. Doch die Zeichen änderten sich, als die Verderbnis Euer Flaggschiff attackierte. Da gebot uns der Todlose, unsere Klingen zu ziehen, und der Tod der Ruchlosen gewährte uns Antworten. Ich schickte sofort Seine Spinner in die unteren Buchten, die dem Feind nicht in die Hände fallen durften. Andere dienten Eurer auserwählten Schar als Führer."
languages.original_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."

languages.text: "Düşmanımızın kim olduğunu bilmiyorduk. Yalnızca bölme panellerini kaplayan, dehşet dolu bir gölge vardı. Kehanetlerin sesi kesildi ve okumalardan hiçbir cevap çıkmadı. Nitekim sancak geminize yozlaşma hücum ettiğinde alametler değişti. Ölmeyen bize kılıçlarımızı kuşanmamızı söyledi. Cevaplar, menfurların ölümleri arasından çınlayarak yükseldi. Derhâl O'nun dokurlarını düşman ellerine düşmemesi gereken alt bölmelerdeki insanlara gönderdim. Diğerleri ise özenle seçtiğiniz bir avuç hizmetkârınıza kılavuz oldu."
languages.original_text: "We did not know who our foe is. There was only the appalling shadow upon the bulkheads; the divinations were silent, and no answer was read. But the signs changed when the corruption assailed your flagship: the Undying One bid us bare our blades, and among the deaths of the wicked, answers rang out. At once I sent His spinners to those of the lower bays that should not fall into the foe's hands. Others became guides for your chosen few."
